pages.text:
KEY WEST CAMPGROUND
​
Find availability
ABOUT US
Our family owned campground offers convenient RV camping spots and cozy vacation rentals. We are the closest campground to Key West, making it an ideal choice for those looking to explore Key West and the stunning beauty of the island.
For kayaks, paddleboards, or small inflatables/skiffs less than 16ft with a draft of 4" or less
SITES
ACCOMODATIONS
xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?
RV SITES
FULL HOOKUP
AMENITIES
Back-in gravel sites that accommodate self-contained RV's up to 42’ plus one personal vehicle must fit in your site
Water, electric, and sewage hookups
30/50 amp power
Laundry facilities, Wi-Fi, tiki huts, dog park, and
water access
for dinghys, kayaks and paddleboards
RV SITES
Oct - Apr starting at $145/night
May - Sep starting at $90/night
​
From:
$75/night*
Book Now
VACATION RENTALS
Campers and one bedroom units up to 2 people, 2 night minimum
Starting at:
$159/night
Book Now
All sites are back-in sites with full hookup and 30/50amp service. Your one vehicle in addition to your RV must fit in your site, We do not have additional parking, otherwise the car must be parked outside on the right of way.
When booking a site, the length of the RV must include a bumper to bumper or trailer tongue to back bumper length including any type of bike and motorcycle racks. 
All RVs must be SELF-CONTAINED as we DO NOT HAVE A BATHHOUSE.
We recommend parking at the entrance and walking to your site to be able to plan your approach as most sites are best to back in from the entrance.

At Leo's we do not allow third party drop off RV service at our campground, due to conflict of schedule dropping off and picking up equipment.

*Prices are based on 1-2 people and does not include 12.5% sales tax. Rates are subject to change without notice. There is a 2 night minimum stay and a 2 night non refundable deposit at time of reservation for Memorial weekend, 4th Of July week, Labor day weekend and Holiday break from December 20 to January 1st. There is a 4 night minimum for Fantasy Fest 10 day celebration, a 50% non refundable deposit is required at time of reservation and 50% non refundable balance to be paid a month prior arrival. Monthly reservations require a $250 nonrefundable deposit at time of making the reservation, and  they can only be made over the phone or in person.

∗∗Additional discount of $100 per month is offered for multiple months stay. Total amount must be paid in full at arrival. In the event of an early checkout, there will be no refunds, prorate, or credit, no exceptions.
FIND US
5236 Suncrest Rd
Key West, FL 33040
leoscampground@gmail.com
305-296-5260
HOURS OF OPERATION:
Seven days a week
10am - 5pm
